quote: It is better to travel well than to arrive.
name: Buddha

quote: Perhaps travel cannot prevent bigotry, but by demonstrating that all peoples cry, laugh, eat, worry, and die, it can introduce the idea that if we try and understand each other, we may even become friends.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: One travels more usefully when alone, because he reflects more.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Though we travel the world over to find the beautiful, we must carry it with us or we find it not.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The World is a book, and those who do not travel read only a page.
name: Saint Augustine

quote: Never go on trips with anyone you do not love.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: What does it mean to pre-board? Do you get on before you get on?
name: George Carlin

quote: I dislike feeling at home when I am abroad.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: We travel, some of us forever, to seek other states, other lives, other souls.
name: Anais Nin

quote: If you wish to travel far and fast, travel light. Take off all your envies, jealousies, unforgiveness, selfishness and fears.

name: W. C. Fields

quote: To travel is to discover that everyone is wrong about other countries.

quote: Travel, in the younger sort, is a part of education in the elder, a part of experience.

quote: I've always enjoyed traveling and having experience with different cultures and different people. But it's also a wonderful thing to be able to benefit and enable research, not only in our country but around the world.

quote: The traveler sees what he sees, the tourist sees what he has come to see.

quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.

quote: No one realizes how beautiful it is to travel until he comes home and rests his head on his old, familiar pillow.

quote: Like all great travellers, I have seen more than I remember, and remember more than I have seen.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: He travels the fastest who travels alone.

quote: Travelers repose and dream among my leaves.

quote: Our deeds still travel with us from afar, and what we have been makes us what we are.
name: George Eliot

quote: To the lover of wilderness, Alaska is one of the most wonderful countries in the world.
name: John Muir

quote: It is not fit that every man should travel it makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: A wise traveler never despises his own country.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: Just got back from a pleasure trip: I took my mother-in-law to the airport.
name: Henny Youngman

quote: Airplane travel is nature's way of making you look like your passport photo.

quote: In America there are two classes of travel - first class, and with children.
name: Robert Benchley

quote: You know more of a road by having traveled it than by all the conjectures and descriptions in the world.
name: William Hazlitt

quote: You define a good flight by negatives: you didn't get hijacked, you didn't crash, you didn't throw up, you weren't late, you weren't nauseated by the food. So you are grateful.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: Travelers never think that they are the foreigners.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: The traveler was active he went strenuously in search of people, of adventure, of experience. The tourist is passive he expects interesting things to happen to him. He goes 'sight-seeing.'
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: A man travels the world in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.
name: George Edward Moore

quote: Why, I'd like nothing better than to achieve some bold adventure, worthy of our trip.
name: Aristophanes

quote: The world is a country which nobody ever yet knew by description one must travel through it one's self to be acquainted with it.
name: Lord Chesterfield

quote: Every perfect traveler always creates the country where he travels.
name: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Tourists don't know where they've been, travelers don't know where they're going.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: Certainly, travel is more than the seeing of sights it is a change that goes on, deep and permanent, in the ideas of living.
name: Miriam Beard

quote: When I go on Japanese Airlines, I really love it because I like Japanese food.
name: Phil Collins

quote: Traveling, you realize that differences are lost: each city takes to resembling all cities, places exchange their form, order, distances, a shapeless dust cloud invades the continents.

quote: Venice is like eating an entire box of chocolate liqueurs in one go.

quote: We wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
name: Hilaire Belloc

quote: I love short trips to New York to me it is the finest three-day town on earth.
name: James Cameron

quote: I think a major element of jetlag is psychological. Nobody ever tells me what time it is at home.

quote: Travel becomes a strategy for accumulating photographs.
name: Susan Sontag

quote: The time to enjoy a European trip is about three weeks after unpacking.
name: George Ade

quote: I never make a trip to the United States without visiting a supermarket. To me they are more fascinating than any fashion salon.
name: Wallis Simpson

quote: Everyone carries his own inch rule of taste, and amuses himself by applying it, triumphantly, wherever he travels.

quote: If one had but a single glance to give the world, one should gaze on Istanbul.
name: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: I am not a great cook, I am not a great artist, but I love art, and I love food, so I am the perfect traveller.

quote: When the traveler goes alone he gets acquainted with himself.
name: Liberty Hyde Bailey

quote: Travel can be one of the most rewarding forms of introspection.
name: Lawrence Durrell

quote: No matter where I've been overseas, the food stinks, except in Italy.
name: Carmen Electra

quote: Travel is glamorous only in retrospect.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: Certain travellers give the impression that they keep moving because only then do they feel fully alive.
name: Ella Maillart

quote: You get educated by traveling.
name: Solange Knowles

quote: The hardest part is to travel, and to be away from your family.
name: Glenn Tipton

quote: My wife and I have so much fun when we travel and find anything... like stray cats and squirrels.

quote: The attention of a traveller, should be particularly turned, in the first place, to the various works of Nature, to mark the distinctions of the climates he may explore, and to offer such useful observations on the different productions as may occur.

quote: Travelling expands the mind rarely.
name: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: Airline travel is hours of boredom interrupted by moments of stark terror.

quote: A journey by Sea and Land, Five Hundred Miles, is not undertaken without money.

quote: The trouble with travelling back later on is that you can never repeat the same experience.

quote: I get pretty much all the exercise I need walking down airport concourses carrying bags.

quote: When I'm in London I do have the convenience of being close to St James Park which is also good for me because it gives me an excuse to get out and get some much needed exercise!

quote: Traveling is seeing it is the implicit that we travel by.

quote: If you travel first class, you think first class and you are more likely to play first class.

quote: Travel, which was once either a necessity or an adventure, has become very largely a commodity, and from all sides we are persuaded into thinking that it is a social requirement, too.

quote: We are what our thoughts have made us so take care about what you think. Words are secondary. Thoughts live they travel far.
name: Swami Vivekananda

quote: A lie can travel half way around the world while the truth is putting on its shoes.

quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.

quote: It is for us to pray not for tasks equal to our powers, but for powers equal to our tasks, to go forward with a great desire forever beating at the door of our hearts as we travel toward our distant goal.

quote: I had rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad and to travel for it too!

These are great qualities that they must work towards. This is my message to the young people.

quote: Writing and travel broaden your ass if not your mind and I like to write standing up.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: When a place gets crowded enough to require ID's, social collapse is not far away. It is time to go elsewhere. The best thing about space travel is that it made it possible to go elsewhere.

quote: The land created me. I'm wild and lonesome. Even as I travel the cities, I'm more at home in the vacant lots.

quote: Hurt leads to bitterness, bitterness to anger, travel too far that road and the way is lost.

quote: For my part, I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: To travel hopefully is a better thing than to arrive.

quote: Uncontrolled, the hunger and thirst after God may become an obstacle, cutting off the soul from what it desires. If a man would travel far along the mystic road, he must learn to desire God intensely but in stillness, passively and yet with all his heart and mind and strength.

quote: You and I come by road or rail, but economists travel on infrastructure.
name: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Everywhere is nowhere. When a person spends all his time in foreign travel, he ends by having many acquaintances, but no friends.

quote: I want to teach. I want to speak. I want to travel.
name: Hillary Clinton

quote: The man who never in his mind and thoughts travel'd to heaven is no artist.
name: William Blake

name: Stephen Hawking

quote: The whole object of travel is not to set foot on foreign land it is at last to set foot on one's own country as a foreign land.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Travel teaches toleration.

quote: All travel has its advantages. If the passenger visits better countries, he may learn to improve his own. And if fortune carries him to worse, he may learn to enjoy it.

quote: Travel makes a wise man better, and a fool worse.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: People who don't travel cannot have a global view, all they see is what's in front of them. Those people cannot accept new things because all they know is where they live.

quote: The cool thing about being famous is traveling. I have always wanted to travel across seas, like to Canada and stuff.
name: Britney Spears

quote: I do have to travel a lot for speaking engagements.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Man is an artifact designed for space travel. He is not designed to remain in his present biologic state any more than a tadpole is designed to remain a tadpole.
name: William S. Burroughs

quote: It always rains on tents. Rainstorms will travel thousands of miles, against prevailing winds for the opportunity to rain on a tent.
name: Dave Barry

quote: Strange - is it not? That of the myriads who Before us passed the door of Darkness through, Not one returns to tell us of the road Which to discover we must travel too.
name: Horace

quote: I have wandered all my life, and I have also traveled the difference between the two being this, that we wander for distraction, but we travel for fulfillment.
name: Hilaire Belloc

quote: I never saw a discontented tree. They grip the ground as though they liked it, and though fast rooted they travel about as far as we do.
name: John Muir

quote: Travel and society polish one, but a rolling stone gathers no moss, and a little moss is a good thing on a man.

quote: I just travel the world with my backpack and my cameras and a bunch of Clif bars.
name: Henry Rollins

quote: We travel together, passengers on a little spaceship, dependent on it's vulnerable reserves of air and soil, all committed, for our safety, to it's security and peace. Preserved from annihilation only by the care, the work and the love we give our fragile craft.

quote: The first time probably people really were aware of me, I unfortunately had the title of Showtime's Funniest Person in America. And that's a really tough title to travel around with when you're not even known.

quote: To read a writer is for me not merely to get an idea of what he says, but to go off with him and travel in his company.

quote: To bring up a child in the way he should go, travel that way yourself once in a while.

quote: Life is an unfoldment, and the further we travel the more truth we can comprehend. To understand the things that are at our door is the best preparation for understanding those that lie beyond.

quote: The photograph reverses the purpose of travel, which until now had been to encounter the strange and unfamiliar.

quote: The way to Heaven is ascending we must be content to travel uphill, though it be hard and tiresome, and contrary to the natural bias of our flesh.

quote: I travel light. I think the most important thing is to be in a good mood and enjoy life, wherever you are.

quote: I want to see friends more and travel more.
name: Jennifer Aniston

quote: An English man does not travel to see English men.
name: Laurence Sterne

quote: The one thing I regret was that my work required an enormous amount of my time, and a lot of travel.
name: Neil Armstrong

quote: I've met the most interesting people while flying or on a boat. These methods of travel seem to attract the kind of people I want to be with.

quote: I am blessed for what I have, but I believed in it from the beginning. Today, the dream is the same: I still want to travel, I still want to entertain, and I most certainly still want to have fun.

quote: Dealing with global warming doesn't mean we have all got to suddenly stop breathing. Dealing with global warming means that we have to stop waste, and if you travel for no reason whatsoever, that is a waste.
name: David Attenborough

quote: Christmas to a child is the first terrible proof that to travel hopefully is better than to arrive.
name: Stephen Fry

quote: Thanks to the Interstate Highway System, it is now possible to travel across the country from coast to coast without seeing anything.
name: Charles Kuralt

quote: The secret to modern life is finding the measure in time management. I have two kids, career and I travel, and I don't think my life is any different than most couples. The most valuable commodity now for many people is time and how to parcel that out.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: I have two kids, career and I travel, and I don't think my life is any different than most couples. The most valuable commodity now for many people is time and how to parcel that out.
name: Hugh Jackman

quote: Travel in all the four quarters of the earth, yet you will find nothing anywhere. Whatever there is, is only here.
name: Ramakrishna

quote: I travel the garden of music, thru inspiration. It's a large, very large garden, seen?
name: Peter Tosh

quote: Of all possible subjects, travel is the most difficult for an artist, as it is the easiest for a journalist.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: I see my path, but I don't know where it leads. Not knowing where I'm going is what inspires me to travel it.
name: Rosalia de Castro

quote: Nothing in the universe can travel at the speed of light, they say, forgetful of the shadow's speed.
name: Howard Nemerov

quote: Michael Palin decided to give up on his considerable comedy talents to make those dreadfully tedious travel shows. Have you ever tried to watch one?

quote: I'm such a girl for the living room. I really like to stay in my nest and not move. I travel in my mind, and that that's a rigorous state of journeying for me. My body isn't that interested in moving from place to place.

quote: As you think, you travel, and as you love, you attract. You are today where your thoughts have brought you you will be tomorrow where your thoughts take you.
name: James Lane Allen

quote: I love coming home to Melbourne. The first thing I do is have a coffee. It's just so much better here than anywhere else. It's better than in Italy and I travel a lot. I crave it.

quote: I get a friend to travel with me... I need somebody to bring me back to who I am. It's hard to be alone.

quote: I want my handbags and my shoes to be stylish but I want to make sure that they're versatile. I travel and I have to make sure the pieces I put into my bag can go with a dress or with shorts or jeans.

quote: When I travel, I love speaking to women around the world about the things that inspire them, the fashions they like, what makes something good and what would make it even better.
name: Maria Sharapova

quote: In this world, shipmates, sin that pays its way can travel freely, and without passport whereas Virtue, if a pauper, is stopped at all frontiers.
name: Herman Melville

quote: I love to not work. I like to travel. I work maybe half the year, no more.
name: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Snowboarding's tough, because you've got to go to the mountains. For me, I love the skateboard season because I get to hangout at home and still be skating. I don't have to travel to Norway or Japan or these crazy places to be snowboarding.

quote: I like to go to work, and also, I don't have any kids. I don't have any hobbies. I don't like to travel. So going to work is kind of it.

quote: Own only what you can always carry with you: know languages, know countries, know people. Let your memory be your travel bag.

quote: Know how to travel from your town to a nearby town without a car, either by bus or by rail.

quote: When you travel so many weeks a year, it's always nice to have a home-cooked meal.

quote: I don't feel restless, I just like to travel.
name: Brad Pitt

quote: I'd rather have huge success and huge failures than travel in the middle of the road.

quote: I think kids ought to travel. I think it's very good to carry kids around. It's good for them. Of course it's tough on the parents.
name: Doris Lessing

quote: It's rather naive, apart from being ethically objectionable, to assume that our investigators travel around the country with bags of money trying to bribe witnesses to lie on the witness stand. We just don't operate that way.

quote: We must travel in the direction of our fear.
name: John Berryman

quote: Restore human legs as a means of travel. Pedestrians rely on food for fuel and need no special parking facilities.
name: Lewis Mumford

quote: When I haven't been working I've tried to travel a lot.
name: Emma Watson

quote: We have so much pride in welcoming these passengers onto the plane, and they have so much pride in travel. It's something that I definitely always remember, when I'm playing a scene on the plane, just to imbue everything with that sense of excitement.
name: Christina Ricci

quote: I've got a real sense of three-dimensional geometry. I can look at a flat piece of fabric and know that if I put a slit in it and make some fabric travel around a square, then when you lift it up it will drape in a certain way, and I can feel how that will happen.

quote: Your lost friends are not dead, but gone before, advanced a stage or two upon that road which you must travel in the steps they trod.
name: Aristophanes

quote: If you have enthusiasm, you have a very dynamic, effective companion to travel with you on the road to Somewhere.
name: Loretta Young

quote: My job is to be a spokesman - the spokesman, I suppose - for the President, for the White House, to do the daily briefings, to manage the press corps in terms of travel, day-to-day needs, access, interviews, all those issues.
name: Dee Dee Myers

quote: Before the BBC, I joined the Navy in order to travel.
name: David Attenborough

quote: I like animals. I like natural history. The travel bit is not the important bit. The travel bit is what you have to do in order to go and look at animals.
name: David Attenborough

quote: The things I was allowed to experience, the people I was able to call friends, teammates, mentors, coaches and opponents, the travel, all of it, are far more than anything I ever thought possible in my lifetime.
name: Curt Schilling

quote: And it was a great experience, you know, to travel the world and compete at a certain level. It teaches you discipline, focus, and certainly keeps you out of trouble.
name: Jason Statham

quote: Interesting things come your way but as you get older, your lifestyle changes. I don't want to travel I don't want to be in a hotel room away from my family.
name: Gary Oldman

quote: There is no budget for travel for a Shadow Foreign Secretary.
name: William Hague

quote: I am a passionate traveler, and from the time I was a child, travel formed me as much as my formal education.
name: David Rockefeller

quote: When I travel, I like to take advantage of room service. I'm really into eggs Benedict in the morning.
name: Jenny McCarthy

quote: Oh, I'm terrible at travel.
name: Johnny Vegas

quote: The person attempting to travel two roads at once will get nowhere.
name: Xun Zi

quote: The thing about Hemingway that people forget is that all the stuff he did was at a time where people weren't traveling that much. At 19 he travels to Italy. He goes to the Spanish Civil War. He goes to China, he goes to Africa so at that time to travel that much is really incredible.
name: Clive Owen

quote: I was born to travel and write verse.
name: Theophile Gautier

quote: I want to travel. Maybe I'll end up living in Norway, making cakes.
name: Eva Green

quote: It's important to travel and move and have a continual set of experiences so you've got more to feed back into your work. For me, it's a natural thing.
name: Cate Blanchett

quote: The helicopter is a fine way to travel, but it induces a view of the world that only God and CEOs share on a regular basis.
name: Morley Safer

quote: The most important thing we can do is inspire young minds and to advance the kind of science, math and technology education that will help youngsters take us to the next phase of space travel.
name: John Glenn

quote: Besides, I'm a gypsy at heart and I like to travel around.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: My goals have changed throughout my life. At one time it was winning awards, selling out concert dates, selling more albums than anyone else. Now, my goals are to see my grandchildren grown, live a long and healthy life with my family and friends and travel the world.
name: Reba McEntire

quote: I think it's important that kids have responsibilities and understand the value of things, but I think it's great I get to travel the world with my daughter.
name: Salma Hayek

quote: You can't expect the entire world to come to New York to see you. You have to travel to them.
name: Theodore Bikel

quote: I get cold - really cold - when I travel.
name: Laura Linney

quote: I'd love to travel to the Holy Land.
name: Loretta Lynn

quote: I grew up in South Africa and I would look at maps and we were at the bottom of the world. There was this whole thing up there. I was always reading encyclopedias about the world. So travel was something I was always attracted to.
name: Charlize Theron

quote: If you travel to Germany, it's still absolutely Germany. If you travel to Sweden, it still has a Swedish identity.
name: Steven Patrick Morrissey

quote: Since I travel so much, it's always great to be home. There's nothing like getting to raid my own refrigerator at two in the morning.
name: Amy Grant

quote: No one's going to be able to operate without a grounding in the basic sciences. Language would be helpful, although English is becoming increasingly international. And travel. You have to have a global attitude.
name: Rupert Murdoch

quote: In between films I like to travel and hope to visit every continent before I become a mother.
name: Diane Kruger

quote: Extensive traveling induces a feeling of encapsulation, and travel, so broadening at first, contracts the mind.
name: Paul Theroux

quote: People have to make journeys, what we want is people to have alternatives in public transport so that they can make a choice about the sort of way in which they're going to travel.
name: Theresa May

quote: I stepped away to find out more about myself, which I was having difficulty doing as a football player. I got a chance to travel the world. I studied Eastern philosophy, and I've grown as a person so much.
name: Ricky Williams

quote: I mean, I'd love to have a private jet - I know people who fly by private jet all the time... I've hitched a ride a few times and it is not overrated at all it's a great way to travel!
name: Marc Jacobs

quote: To get away from one's working environment is, in a sense, to get away from one's self and this is often the chief advantage of travel and change.
name: Charles Horton Cooley

quote: This evening I wish to suggest that we Christians should accompany people on their pilgrimages. Specifically we should travel with people as they search for the good, the true and the beautiful.
name: Timothy Radcliffe

quote: Some people are drawn naturally - there are natural guitarists, and there are natural piano players, and I think guitar implies travel, a sort of footloose gypsy existence. You grab your bag and you go to the next town.
name: Hugh Laurie

quote: I've had a very interesting career. I get to do amazing things and work with amazing people and travel and learn languages - things most people don't get the opportunity to do.
name: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: Air travel is the safest form of travel aside from walking even then, the chances of being hit by a public bus at 30,000 feet are remarkably slim. I also have no problem with confined spaces. Or heights. What I am afraid of is speed.
name: Sloane Crosley

quote: In recent years, I've been writing because I'm fortunate enough to work in the world of food television, to travel and taste and learn about cooking from the best chefs in the business.
name: Ted Allen

quote: In Heaven, I believe my dad is somewhere doing something nice. I feel I've been too lucky to travel this far without somebody guiding me.
name: Katherine Jenkins

quote: I always want to give my best and do the best I can. I know when I have sung my best and when I haven't. There can be stresses and hassles with time travel and press attention. I just have to adapt and find a way of dealing with it.
name: Katherine Jenkins

quote: What I like in this job is you can travel to many places, many imaginations.
name: Marion Cotillard

quote: I've three children, three grandchildren, I work, I travel, and I'm very happily married. I'm very satisfied and happy with my life and there really isn't anything I want.
name: Joan Collins

quote: More than any other setting - more than battlefields or boardrooms or a spaceship headed for intergalactic travel - I'll put my money on the family to provide an endless source of comedy, tragedy and intrigue.
name: Joyce Maynard

quote: It's been a huge blessing, being able to travel and have a great life.
name: Seann William Scott

quote: There are so many things I want to do. Like, I want to get an artist, a musician, a photographer, and a bunch of dancers that I know and just travel across Africa and just film it and just see what happens. Do and learn as much as I possibly can. Luckily, I have a lot more time.
name: Channing Tatum

quote: To travel is to take a journey into yourself.
name: Danny Kaye

quote: When I thought I was retired, I wanted to travel around the world and watch soccer games.
name: Drew Carey

quote: As I travel across the country speaking about MS, perhaps I can offer others comfort and hope.
name: Annette Funicello

quote: Travel, of course, narrows the mind.

quote: I really enjoy what I do, and who I'm with and where I am. Having said that, I'm not really a person of habit, because what I do in my job is travel around the world and play concerts to people, and occasionally do very weird things.

quote: I fly economy. I do often fly first class, but I don't travel with a posse, or bodyguard, or an assistant.

name: Bruce Campbell

quote: The genre has moved into this commercial aspect of itself, and ignored this extraordinarily rich literature that's filed everywhere else except under travel.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: I just don't see myself as a travel writer. I can't. I don't.
name: Robyn Davidson

quote: I don't have any superstitions, but what I always travel with is my pillow and my coffee.
name: Natalie Coughlin

quote: While the spoken word can travel faster, you can't take it home in your hand. Only the written word can be absorbed wholly at the convenience of the reader.
name: Kingman Brewster, Jr.

quote: If I had children, I would be very selfish. I wouldn't be out doing things. But by not having kids, it makes me freer to travel the world and talk about things I feel are important.
name: Linda Blair

quote: I was home-schooled. But going to high school, I never would've been able to travel the U.S. or been able to do acting.
name: Ethan Embry

quote: For people to understand me when I travel, I speak with my hands.
name: Marcel Carne

quote: Travel is the most private of pleasures. There is no greater bore than the travel bore. We do not in the least want to hear what he has seen in Hong Kong.
name: Vita Sackville-West

quote: I can tell you that when I travel the state, when I talk to people, they are really struggling, in a very real way. They're losing their jobs, they're losing their homes, they're dealing with financial challenges.
name: Alexi Giannoulias

quote: I'm vegan on home base, but when I travel to other countries, I throw it all into the garbage.
name: Lake Bell

quote: I used to travel in tennis shoes I am just not allowed to anymore. I'm an old hippie from San Francisco.
name: Amy Irving

quote: I'd like to be able to travel anywhere in an instant.
name: Jason Behr

quote: I travel 330 days a year and eat every two and a half hours - I'm a big guy. I always carry a fork, little bottles of spices, and Sriracha. I eat what I feel like eating.
name: Robert Irvine

quote: When I began writing that I was able and did travel and met some fascinating people and also uncovered some history, which has not been discovered before.
name: Arthur Hailey

quote: I might have been born in a hovel but I am determined to travel with the wind and the stars.
name: Jacqueline Cochran

quote: I was afterwards sorry for this, though, if I ever travel again, I shall trust to none but natives, as the climate of Africa is too trying to foreigners.
name: John H. Speke

quote: But he knew people and he was head writer for Have Gun Will Travel, and if you took those early Star Treks that we did and put us in a western wardrobe and put us on wagon train going west, we can say the same lines.
name: Majel Barrett

quote: The travel, the amazing work I have had the chance to do, the meetings with different people are all very inspiring and give me lots of positive energy.
name: Saskia de Brauw

quote: When I think of myself at 15, even 17, I could simply not have done this work on an international level and travel all the time, take care of myself and not feel lost. I feel very happy that this is happening now, and not 10 years ago, as I feel stronger as a person.
name: Saskia de Brauw

quote: Spirit of place! It is for this we travel, to surprise its subtlety and where it is a strong and dominant angel, that place, seen once, abides entire in the memory with all its own accidents, its habits, its breath, its name.
name: Alice Meynell

quote: I don't like to travel as much as I have in the past, but it's good for my soul to get to pick, especially with these good musicians and these guys that play so well.
name: Earl Scruggs

quote: All I wanted was to be big, to be in show business and to travel... and that's what I've been doing all my life.
name: Count Basie

quote: When the plane is delayed, it's not the fault of the girl at the desk. I'm resigned to the fact that everything is out of my control and that air travel nowadays is barbaric.
name: Tom Conti

quote: Travel is very subjective. What one person loves, another loathes.
name: Robin Leach

quote: I travel abroad constantly on book promotion and research, and the Internet is invaluable to me for accessing U.K. news in places such as America, which most of the time hasn't heard of England.
name: Peter James

quote: Travel is very subjective. What one person loves, another loathes. I would say a private paradise in the Caribbean. If you want culture and class, I would say Tuscany. If you want exotic, I would say Bangkok, Thailand.
name: Robin Leach

quote: Modeling has given me the opportunity to travel outside of Brazil and see the world. I have been meeting many interesting and talented people along the way.
name: Izabel Goulart

quote: I want to do more documentaries and travel to places I haven't been. That is where I think I can be fulfilled.
name: Tatjana Patitz

quote: I wanted to be looked at for the skateboarder that I was. I didn't want to be the 36-year-old skateboarder who's still holding on while owning a company at the same time. I wanted to make my mark and travel and accomplish a few things here and there and then get out.
name: Jason Lee

quote: I grew up skateboarding it was fun. I didn't think about money, I didn't know how much professional skateboarders made. I just knew that if I became a professional skateboarder, I would achieve a lot and get to travel and do these great things.
name: Jason Lee

quote: You become a better writer by writing. You become a better travel writer by writing about travel.
name: Tim Cahill

quote: I am living out my adolescent dream of travel and adventure.
name: Tim Cahill

quote: You have to first be a writer and somebody who loves to write. If I couldn't travel, I would still write.
name: Tim Cahill

quote: Restless, and in desperate need of adventure, I quit my job at an insurance company to travel west with a couple of guys I smoked pot with, scandalizing my family.
name: Mink Stole

quote: If interstellar travel is as time- or energy- demanding as the above figures indicate, it is far from obvious what the motive for colonization might be.
name: Barney Oliver

quote: It would be a pity if, frustrated by the price of travel, we elected to become a society that never made contact, that never gave SETI a fair chance.
name: Barney Oliver

quote: Our covering ministry is Challenge for Christ ministries, and Travel the Road was solely our mission arm, designed to expose people to what missions are, then connect them with agencies that send people out.
name: Michael Scott

quote: I think it's important to travel around in order to get a notion of what's going on, to find out what people are think about. I enjoy talking on campuses most because people are more informed and discussion is generally livelier.
name: Harrison Salisbury

quote: My Christmas present to myself each year is to see how much air travel can open up the world and take me to places as far from sheltered California and Japan as possible.
name: Pico Iyer

quote: I intend to travel to Okinawa and to visit with Okinawa officials and the citizens of Okinawa at an early date. I will send my best analysis of that situation, including the local attitudes, back to Washington, to the government there.
name: Howard Baker

quote: Since traveling is such a big part of my life when I am working, I like to vacation relatively close to home. Florida is a great place for me to go and relax. It's so close, which is perfect because it's the minimal travel time.
name: Hilary Rhoda

quote: For me, Dracula has always been associated with travel and beautiful historical places.
name: Elizabeth Kostova

quote: Our government shouldn't tell us where to travel and where not to travel.
name: Jeff Flake

quote: Foreign policy is about trying to deliver for them the best possible economic benefits, the chance to travel, to study, to work, the opportunity through trade to be able to sell their goods and services and as much peace and security so they can live and bring their kids up so they don't have to fear war.
name: Catherine Ashton

quote: I really wish we could stay longer in the countries we visit, but I've been lucky to have visited most of them before, because I've done a tremendous amount of travel.
name: Phil Keoghan

quote: I travel a lot I hate having my life disrupted by routine.
name: Caskie Stinnett

quote: We have had a chance to travel to all 56 counties in this state, and I have had the chance to sit around with cups of coffee and having conversations about what matters to Montanans.
name: Steve Daines

quote: I usually travel with a lot of people, like my dad, mom and sisters.
name: Booboo Stewart

quote: Absolutely the worst thing about this job is the travel and being away from family. I have a wife and three wonderful children, the kids are all active in sports and it's very difficult to up and leave and miss them growing up.
name: Roy Clark

quote: The thing I love about being an actor is the ability to travel and experience new cultures.
name: Paul Wesley

quote: I'm crazy about my father, he's an amazing man, a real adventurer. He took us with him to travel all over the world. We were in places that were so remote, that white people hardly ever reach them.
name: Peta Wilson

quote: It's hard now to imagine that kind of travel and the daily tasks they simply took for granted. If a wagon axle broke, you had to stop and carve a new one. To cross a river, you sometimes had to build a raft.
name: James Houston

quote: To enjoy enduring success we should travel a little in advance of the world.
name: John McDonald

quote: The travel writer seeks the world we have lost - the lost valleys of the imagination.
name: Alexander Cockburn

quote: I really enjoy travel, I enjoy the U.K., I enjoy Scotland, Glasgow.
name: George Wendt

quote: Travel is impossible, but daydreaming about travel is easy.
name: B. J. Novak

quote: My first ever job after college was as a flight attendant. I wanted to travel and could not afford it, so I decided to get myself a job where I could travel. I did it for two years and had great fun.
name: Jacqueline Winspear

quote: Whenever I travel anywhere, I'm constantly asked if I'm Swedish. It's the burden of most Norwegians. The Swedes have just got a better publicity agent, I think.
name: Christopher Heyerdahl

quote: I have no plans to have any other home than Moscow. However, I love to travel, and I'm very comfortable in New York. In many ways, it reminds me of Moscow in its energy and drive.
name: Mikhail Prokhorov

quote: I always travel with my bike and it has become a little more difficult to do it nowadays, but I stick it in 3,5 by 6-foot case and wheel that thing in.
name: Donny Robinson

quote: I used my aviation contacts to open a travel agency. I used to book Caribbean flights.
name: Joseph Force Crater

quote: I always enjoyed politics. I worked at the White House recently, primarily for the First Lady. Because of my experience running my travel agency, I was in charge of the files she kept on the Travel Office.
name: Joseph Force Crater

quote: You travel across the country, you visit departments, you give talks, you talk about the work at your laboratory - what's going on, what the opportunities are there - you talk about your own research.
name: Frank Press

quote: As the President has indicated, my life has been a life of travel - for 60 years constantly moving over the wide world on journeys which first and last have taken me to 83 countries, and, what is more significant, to most of them again and again.
name: John Raleigh Mott

quote: To travel hopefully is better than to arrive.
name: James Jeans

quote: Now, therefore, the Directors of the company are hereby ordered to see that precautions are taken to make travel on said railroad perfectly safe by using a screw with at least twenty-four inches diameter.
name: Joshua A. Norton

quote: Sometimes I envy people who can be only half crazy, with one foot in the passion and one foot in the real world. But that's not me. I dive into the total crazy experience. That's the only way to travel.
name: Kiran Ahluwalia

quote: Wherever we go, across the Pacific or Atlantic, we meet, not similarity so much as 'the bizarre'. Things astonish us, when we travel, that surprise nobody else.
name: Miriam Beard

quote: We need affordable space travel to inspire our youth, to let them know that they can experience their dreams, can set significant goals and be in a position to lead all of us to future progress in exploration, discovery and fun. Thanks to the X Prize for the inspiration.
name: Burt Rutan

quote: Actually, I started to become an actress because I met someone who was just a friend and I found his life wonderful, I thought, Oh my god, you can travel, you're free, you can do what you want, you're the boss. And then I met an actor and I was in love with him.
name: Lea Seydoux

quote: I sometimes think that Thomas Cook should be numbered among the secular saints. He took travel from the privileged and gave it to the people.
name: Robert Runcie

quote: Travel, instead of broadening the mind, often merely lengthens the conversation.
name: Elizabeth Drew

quote: Too often travel, instead of broadening the mind, merely lengthens the conversation.
name: Elizabeth Drew

quote: The biggest kick I get is to communicate with those who are exiled from the game - in hospitals, homes, prisons - those who have seldom seen a game, who can't travel to a game, those who are blind.
name: Jack Buck

quote: Having my first number one single and being able to travel to places I've never been before has been amazing. The tour was also fantastic. There are so many things which I've experienced this year which I never even dreamed of.
name: Gareth Gates

quote: We must go beyond textbooks, go out into the bypaths and untrodden depths of the wilderness and travel and explore and tell the world the glories of our journey.
name: John Hope Franklin

quote: I hated the idea of a high school sweetheart. Growing up, oh my God, it just made me sick. I wanted to have a range of cool boyfriends. I wanted to travel around and date these interesting men. Then it just happened. You fall in love.
name: Charlotte Arnold

quote: A lot of people say that comedy doesn't travel well. I found it very accessible.
name: Mark Addy

quote: Traveling is my form of self-education. Every stream I fish now is not as good as it used to be. Traveling is my form of self-education. Every stream I fish now is not as good as it used to be. If you keep your eyes open as you travel around, you realize we are destroying this planet.
name: Yvon Chouinard

quote: I think space will be conquered through the mind rather than the clumsy medium of space travel.
name: Patrick Troughton

quote: I travel the world, and I'm happy to say that America is still the great melting pot - maybe a chunky stew rather than a melting pot at this point, but you know what I mean.
name: Philip Glass

quote: Soul travel can be a general expansion of awareness and knowingness or conscious experience of the heavenly worlds.
name: Bob Hayes

quote: Everything has been homogenized. Over time, with television and jet travel, everybody has blended together. Some of our wonderful charm has been lost.
name: Bruce Paltrow

quote: There's no need to travel further. The Los Angeles area is big enough for us.
name: Marvin Davis
